The paper introduces ChemAgent, a self-updating library boosting LLM chemical reasoning via iterative problem-solving. 🧪🔬 #AI #Chemistry
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2501.06590
The system uses Planning, Execution, and Knowledge memories to enhance chemical calculation accuracy. 🔬🚀 #AI #Science
AI-driven solutions excel in chemical analysis, boosting accuracy by 37% via ChemAgent. 🧪🔬 #Chemistry #AI
